data.title: Coinbase accused of neglecting security, costing users up to $300M annually
data.description:

data.title: Crypto Market Rebounds Strongly Despite Tariff Wars
data.description:
TL;DR The crypto market has shown remarkable resilience, rebounding strongly despite the ongoing tariff wars between the United States and China, with major cryptocurrencies regaining lost ground. The initial announcement of tariffs by President Trump led to significant declines and a record $2.29 billion in liquidations. Despite the initial shock, Bitcoin briefly reclaimed the $100,000 ......
source: https://crypto-economy.com/crypto-market-rebounds-strongly-despite-tariff-wars/

data.title: US Sovereign Wealth Fund dashes hopes of Strategic Bitcoin Reserve
data.description:
Hopes of a US Strategic Bitcoin Reserve took another knock after Donald Trump’s executive order about a non-bitcoin US Sovereign Wealth Fund.
The post US Sovereign Wealth Fund dashes hopes of Strategic Bitcoin Reserve appeared first on Protos.
source: https://protos.com/us-sovereign-wealth-fund-dashes-hopes-of-strategic-bitcoin-reserve/

data.title: A whale bought 6.688 million MELANIA at an average price of $1.5
data.description: According to the monitoring of on-chain analyst Yu Jin, a whale withdrew 10.007 million USDC from Binance 2 hours ago and bought 6.688 million MELANIA on the chain at an average price of $1.5. This address has become the second largest currency holding address besides the project party/liquidity/trading platform address.

data.title: Ethereum Traders Buy the Dip as Solana Stablecoins Soar. Will $BEST Go Bullish?
data.description:
Ethereum saw some huge selling in the early trading hours of Monday as it dipped below the $2.1K mark – a 25% dip from its opening price that day. This fall was a result of whale wallets liquidating their positions in $ETH. For instance, two dormant wallets sent $149M and $201M worth of $ETH to Bitfinex. These wallets were last active in 2019 when a withdrawal of 77,736 $ETH was made. Aave...
source: https://www.newsbtc.com/news/ethereum-traders-buy-the-dip-as-solana-stablecoins-soar-will-best-go-bullish/

data.title: Bitcoin to Crash Before Fed-Driven Comeback, Says Arthur Hayes
data.description:
Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, warns that Bitcoin and the broader crypto market could experience another downturn before making a run toward new all-time highs.
The post Bitcoin to Crash Before Fed-Driven Comeback, Says Arthur Hayes appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/bitcoin-to-crash-before-fed-driven-comeback-says-arthur-hayes/
